title: 美术馆禁止照相No photographing in the museum

conversations.english: Execuse me. In this museum, you are not supposed to take pictures.对不起，在美术馆内，你不可以照相。
conversations.chinese: 对不起，在美术馆内，你不可以照相。
conversations.reply_english: Is that right? I didn't know it.是这样吗？我不知道。

title: 对电影的暴力情节的看法

conversations.english: What do you think about violence in movies?你对电影的暴力情节有什么看法？
conversations.chinese: 你对电影的暴力情节有什么看法？
conversations.reply_english: Personally, I'm not for it. I feel it's bad for kids to watch.我个人并不喜欢，我觉得小孩子看那种东西不好。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我个人并不喜欢，我觉得小孩子看那种东西不好。

conversations.english: I'm afraid we can't increase salary this year, money is just too tight.我们今年恐怕不能加薪了, 预算很紧。
conversations.chinese: 我们今年恐怕不能加薪了, 预算很紧。
conversations.reply_english: I'm not sure I can't agree, dan.我恐怕不能同意，dan.
